sense.gloss: chopped burdock root (and sometimes carrot) cooked in sugar and soy sauce

sdata.j: うちの↑子↑↓こ↓、「|きんぴら|ごぼう」が↑言↑↓い↓えなくて、いつも「|きんぴら|ぼごう」になっちゃうの。
sdata.e: My child cannot say "Kinpira style sauteed Gobo", he always says "Pinkira style sauteed Bogo" instead.

sdata.j: うちの↑子↑↓こ↓、「|きんぴら|ごぼう」が↑言↑↓い↓えなくて、いつも「|きんぴら|ぼごう」になっちゃうの。
sdata.e: My kid can't say "Kinpiragobo", he always says "Kinpirabogo" instead.

sdata.j: うちの↑子↑↓こ↓、「|きんぴら|ごぼう」が↑言↑↓い↓えなくて、いつも「|きんぴら|ぼごう」になっちゃうの。
sdata.e: My child cannot say "Kinpira style sauteed great burdock", he always says "Kinpira style sauteed Dockbur" instead.
